title: How long would it take to watch the entire Simpsons series until now, if I watch 3 or 4 episodes everyday? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to the Television Database there are 639 episodes (including specials and The Simpsons Movie) that have aired or are scheduled to air through April 8, 2018. If you watch 3 episodes per day, it would take you 213 days, or 30 weeks, or about 7 months.If you watch 4 episodes per day, it would take you 160 days, or just under 23 weeks, or just over 5 months.Bonus: If you only watched on weekdays and took a break on weekends and watched 3 episodes per day it would take you just over 42.5 weeks or almost 10 months.If you only watched on weekdays and took a break on weekends and watched 4 episodes per day it would take you 32 weeks or just over 7 months.If you only watched on weekends (Saturday and Sunday only) and watched 3 episodes per day it would take about 106.5 weeks and over 24 months!If you only watched on weekends (Saturday and Sunday only) and watched 4 episodes per day it would take about 80 weeks and over 18 months!Keep in mind that by the time you are finished, there will probably be a day or two more of episodes to watch. Let us know when you are finished!
